hero.title: Tennis for kids and adults
hero.subtitle: On weekdays and weekends
hero.note: The coaching is on Christmas break from Mon 23.12. - Mon 6.1.

about.title: Järvenpään Tennis Club
about.subtitle: Established in 1975
about.description: Our goal is to promote tennis activities in Järvenpää and Kerava in cooperation with Kerava Tennis Club. We would like as many people as possible to have the opportunity to play recreational or competitive tennis according to their abilities and goals. We organize guided group lessons for children and adults on weekdays and weekends. In addition, we offer private lessons, short courses, and run an indoor league in Central Uusimaa.
